post.description:
Creates new virtual accounts for the given owners (max 1000 owners). 
		Request body differs for individual vs company owners, and GBP vs EUR virtual accounts.
		It is possible to create virtual accounts without owner bank details - see CreateNoBankDetailsVirtualAccount schemas.
		It is not possible to make payments out of virtual accounts without owner bank details.
		**Field requirements:**
		- **EUR accounts**: All fields must be 1-35 characters and contain only letters, numbers, and the following special characters: / - ? : ( ) . ' + and spaces (no leading spaces).
		- **GBP accounts**: All fields must be 1-140 characters and cannot contain: | _ [ ] < > ^ ` ~ \ $ (no leading spaces).

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The account id for the segregated account

202.description: The virtual account creation request was received successfully

post.description: Closes the virtual account with the given IBAN

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The account id for the segregated account

parameters.name: iban
parameters.description: The IBAN of the virtual account

202.description: The virtual account closure request was received successfully

404.description: The accountId or IBAN is unknown

post.description: Sends a payment from the virtual account with the given IBAN

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The account id for the segregated account

parameters.name: iban
parameters.description: The IBAN of the virtual account

404.description: The accountId or IBAN is unknown

get.description: Gets all virtual accounts for the given segregated account

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The account id for the segregated account

parameters.name: pageIndex
parameters.description: The page offset of results to return

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The limit of number of results to return

200.description: The virtual accounts were retrieved successfully

put.description: Updates the owner bank details for the virtual account with the given IBAN

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The account id for the segregated account

parameters.name: iban
parameters.description: The IBAN of the virtual account

200.description: The owner bank details were updated successfully

404.description: The accountId or iban is unknown

put.description: Updates the owner address for the virtual account with the given IBAN

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The account id for the segregated account

parameters.name: iban
parameters.description: The IBAN of the virtual account

200.description: The owner address was updated successfully

404.description: The accountId or iban is unknown

get.summary: Get the balance for an account

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The id of the account

404.description: The balance for the account was not found

get.description: Get the details of a single payment for a given account and transaction id

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The account id

parameters.name: transactionId
parameters.description: The transaction id of the payment

404.description: No payment was found for the account with the given transaction id

get.description: Get the details of the payments for an account

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The account id

parameters.name: dateFrom
parameters.description: The date to get results from

parameters.name: dateTo
parameters.description: The date to get results to

parameters.name: pageIndex
parameters.description: The page offset of results to return

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The limit of number of results to return

404.description: No payments were found for the account

get.description: Get the details of a single payment for a given account and nonce

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The account id

parameters.name: nonce
parameters.description: The unique nonce of the payment

404.description: No payment was found for the account with the given nonce

post.description: Approve a payment where the beneficiary name does not match the name on the account

parameters.name: e2eId
parameters.description: The end-to-end id of the payment

202.description: The unverified payment was approved successfully.

404.description: No unverified payment was found for this account with the given end-to-end id.

post.description: Cancel a payment where the beneficiary name does not match the name on the account

parameters.name: e2eId
parameters.description: The end-to-end id of the payment

202.description: The unverified payment was cancelled successfully.

404.description: No unverified payment was found for this account with the given end-to-end id.

info.title: Client API Documentation
info.description: This is the api documentation for the BCB client gateway

correlationId.description: The correlation ID provided on the account creation request. If you did not provide correlation ID, it will be generated

name.description: The name of the virtual account owner. Must be 1-35 characters and contain only letters, numbers, and the following special characters: / - ? : ( ) . ' + and spaces (no leading spaces).

addressLine1.description: The first line of the address of the virtual account owner. Must be 1-35 characters and contain only letters, numbers, and the following special characters: / - ? : ( ) . , ' + and spaces (no leading spaces).

addressLine2.description: The second line of the address of the virtual account owner. Must be 1-35 characters and contain only letters, numbers, and the following special characters: / - ? : ( ) . , ' + and spaces (no leading spaces).

addressLine3.description: The third line of the address of the virtual account owner. Must be 1-35 characters and contain only letters, numbers, and the following special characters: / - ? : ( ) . , ' + and spaces (no leading spaces).

city.description: The postal city or town of the virtual account owner. Must be 1-35 characters and contain only letters, numbers, and the following special characters: / - ? : ( ) . , ' + and spaces (no leading spaces).

region.description: The region (e.g. county, state, province, etc.) of the virtual account owner. Must be 1-35 characters and contain only letters, numbers, and the following special characters: / - ? : ( ) . , ' + and spaces (no leading spaces).

postcode.description: The postal code (e.g. postcode, zip code, etc.) of the virtual account owner. Postcode is required for CHAPS payments. Must be 1-35 characters and contain only letters, numbers, and the following special characters: / - ? : ( ) . , ' + and spaces (no leading spaces).

country.description: The 2-letter country code of the virtual account owner's EUR bank account

nationality.description: The 2-letter country code for the virtual account owner's nationality

registrationNumber.description: The registration number of the virtual account owner - only applicable to a corporation. Must be 1-35 characters and contain only letters, numbers, and the following special characters: / - ? : ( ) . , ' + and spaces (no leading spaces).

isIndividual.description: Whether the virtual account owner is an individual as opposed to a corporation

iban.description: The IBAN of the virtual account owner's EUR bank account

bicSwift.description: The BIC of the virtual account owner's EUR bank account

correlationId.description: The correlation ID provided on the account creation request. If you did not provide correlation ID, it will be generated

name.description: The name of the virtual account owner. Must contain at least two words separated by a space. Only English alphabet letters, numbers, '/-?:().'+' and spaces are allowed (no leading spaces).

addressLine1.description: The first line of the address of the virtual account owner. Only English alphabet letters, numbers, '/-?:().'+' ',' and spaces are allowed (no leading spaces).

addressLine2.description: The second line of the address of the virtual account owner. Only English alphabet letters, numbers, '/-?:().'+' ',' and spaces are allowed (no leading spaces).

addressLine3.description: The third line of the address of the virtual account owner. Only English alphabet letters, numbers, '/-?:().'+' ',' and spaces are allowed (no leading spaces).

city.description: The postal city or town of the virtual account owner. Only English alphabet letters, numbers, '/-?:().'+' and spaces are allowed (no leading spaces).

region.description: The region (e.g. county, state, province, etc.) of the virtual account owner. Only English alphabet letters, numbers, '/-?:().'+' and spaces are allowed (no leading spaces).

postcode.description: The postal code (e.g. postcode, zip code, etc.) of the virtual account owner. Postcode is required for CHAPS payments. Only English alphabet letters, numbers, '/-?:().'+' and spaces are allowed (no leading spaces).

country.description: The 2-letter country code of the virtual account owner's bank account

nationality.description: The 2-letter country code for the virtual account owner's nationality

registrationNumber.description: The registration number of the virtual account owner - only applicable to a corporation. Only English alphabet letters, numbers, '/-?:().'+' and spaces are allowed (no leading spaces).

virtualAccountDetails.description: The details of the virtual account

ownerDetails.description: The details of the virtual account owner

iban.description: The IBAN of the virtual account owner's bank account - mandatory for EUR accounts

bicSwift.description: The BIC of the virtual account owner's bank account - mandatory for EUR accounts

iban.description: The IBAN of the virtual account owner's bank account - optional for GBP accounts

accountNumber.description: The 8-digit account number of the virtual account owner's bank account - mandatory for GBP accounts

sortCode.description: The 6-digit sort code of the virtual account owner's bank account - mandatory for GBP accounts

bicSwift.description: The BIC of the virtual account owner's bank account - optional for GBP accounts

addressLine1.description: The first line of the address of the virtual account owner

addressLine2.description: The second line of the address of the virtual account owner

addressLine3.description: The third line of the address of the virtual account owner

city.description: The postal city or town of the virtual account owner

region.description: The region (e.g. county, state, province, etc.) of the virtual account owner

postcode.description: The postal code (e.g. postcode, zip code, etc.) of the virtual account owner. Postcode is required for CHAPS payments

country.description: The 2-letter country code of the virtual account owner's bank account

settled.description: The settled balance of the account. This is formatted with a '.' decimal separator and without thousand separators

available.description: The balance available with which to make payments from the account. This is formatted with a '.' decimal separator and without thousand separators

transactionId.description: The transaction id of the payment

endToEndId.description: The end to end id of the payment

nonce.description: The nonce provided when initiating the payment as a technical dupe check and external reference id

status.description: The current status of the payment

currency.description: The instructed currency of the payment

amount.description: The instructed amount of the payment

rejectReason.description: The reject reason for the payment. Only populated if the payment has been rejected, otherwise undefined

count.description: The total number of results in the filtered, un-paged dataset
